description: To provide scholarships for UCO students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements 2.5 cumulative GPA Preference is given to a student majoring in Political Science, Public Administration, or other majors leading to a career in government service Demonstrated leadership in student government Demonstrated commitment to public or campus services Letters of recommendation from 2 faculty members This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
